holiday_types.title: Holiday Types
holiday_types.content:
The configuration file supports three types:

â€¢ **holidays**: National holidays (including workday adjustments) - Effective in Wage and Student modes
â€¢ **customdays**: Custom holidays - Effective in all modes
â€¢ **schooldays**: School holidays - Effective only in Student mode

editing_tips.title: YAML Editing Tips
editing_tips.content:
YAML Editing Tips:
â€¢ Use `Tab` to indent, `Shift+Tab` to unindent
â€¢ Add `#` at line start to comment
â€¢ Use 2 spaces for each indentation level

**Event Format Examples:**
```yaml
# Single day event
- date: "2026-01-01"
  name: "New Year's Day"

# Range event
- start: "2026-02-17"
  end: "2026-02-23"
  name: "Spring Festival"
```
